name: Starsector
description: Starsector with up to 16gb of RAM allocated for modding. For extremely heavily modded setups. This one may not be stable. You have been warned.
notes: You need enough RAM. Not for lower end computers. Not for 32bit systems
content:
files:
- game: http://s3.amazonaws.com/fractalsoftworks/starsector/starsector_linux-0.9.1a-RC8.zip
game:
  args: -server -XX:CompilerThreadPriority=1 -XX:+CompilerThreadHintNoPreempt -Djava.library.path=./native/linux
    -Xms16384m -Xmx16384m -Xss1024k -classpath janino.jar:commons-compiler.jar:commons-compiler-jdk.jar:starfarer.api.jar:starfarer_obf.jar:jogg-0.0.7.jar:jorbis-0.0.15.jar:json.jar:lwjgl.jar:jinput.jar:log4j-1.2.9.jar:lwjgl_util.jar:fs.sound_obf.jar:fs.common_obf.jar:xstream-1.4.10.jar
    -Dcom.fs.starfarer.settings.paths.saves=./saves -Dcom.fs.starfarer.settings.paths.screenshots=./screenshots
    -Dcom.fs.starfarer.settings.paths.mods=./mods -Dcom.fs.starfarer.settings.paths.logs=.
    com.fs.starfarer.StarfarerLauncher
  exe: jre_linux/bin/java
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    file: $game
